participant_1.background:
I used to spend all my free time playing video games, but now I prefer to go on adventures with my dog.
I'm proud of my ability to keep a positive attitude even when things are tough.
i know how to play the guitar.
i own a ford truck.
I secretly watch baseball games on my phone while I water my sunflowers every morning.

participant_2.background:
I keep my clothes clean but my Renaissance Faire outfit is a special case.
i live on a lake.
i want to be an astronaut when i grow up.
I love the suburbs because I have more space for my family and our movie collection.
Others may be disappointed that I didn't pass the audition, but I'll keep trying my best.

content.text: Hello! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go to Renaissance Faires!
Oh! That's interesting. I've never been to one before.
You should go! They're so much fun. You get to dress up and act like you're in another time period.
That sounds really cool! I'll have to check it out sometime.
I'm sure you'd like it. Do you like to go on adventures?
I do! I love going to new places and trying new things.
Me too! I just went on a hike in the mountains last weekend. It was so much fun!
That sounds amazing! I love hiking. I went on a hike in the Grand Canyon last year. It was incredible.
Wow! That must have been amazing! I've always wanted to go to the Grand Canyon.
You should go! It's absolutely breathtaking.
I will! Maybe we could go together sometime.
